title: Purina Employee Arrested for Stealing and Eating Over $30,000 of Dog Biscuits
subtitle: Rumor: A Purina employee was arrested and charged with theft for stealing and eating $30,000 worth of dog biscuits.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A Purina employee was arrested and charged with theft for stealing and eating $30,000 worth of dog biscuits.
